sourcesContent: import { Button, Modal, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, ModalContent, ModalFooter, ModalOverlay } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import React from 'react' import { useDisclosure } from '@chakra-ui/hooks'; export default function GroupChatModal({children}) { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); return ( <> Open Modal Modal Title ) }
